captures.author: @jpschroeder
captures.text: We're open sourcing dmux. Our internal tool for running Codex and Claude Code swarms. tmux + worktrees + claude/codex/opencode, hooks for worktree automation, a/b claude vs codex, manage worktrees, multi-project per session
captures.whyInteresting: Open source multi-agent orchestration tool — direct complement to Claude Squad

captures.author: @GoogleDeepMind
captures.text: Gemini 3.1 Pro is here. We've significantly improved the model's overall intelligence so it can solve tougher problems.
captures.whyInteresting: Major model release from Google, needs evaluation

captures.author: @shinboson
captures.text: Introducing OpenPlanter, so you can keep tabs on your government since they're almost certainly keeping tabs on you. Correlates disparate data sources, identifies entities and probabilistically looks for anomalies.
captures.whyInteresting: Open-source OSINT tool for data correlation and anomaly detection

captures.author: @WorkflowWhisper
captures.text: Sonnet 4.5 just mass-produced $23,400 in local business contracts in one weekend. Full playbook for selling AI automation to local businesses.
captures.whyInteresting: Detailed local business AI automation playbook — relevant to XPERIENCE

captures.author: @openclaw
captures.text: OpenClaw 2026.2.19 — Apple Watch MVP, Gateway auth & device management, OTEL v2 migration, 40+ security hardening fixes
captures.whyInteresting: Platform we use daily — major security and feature update

captures.author: @istdrc
captures.text: Every API key you paste into an AI agent's input box hits their servers in plaintext. OpenAI keys, Telegram tokens, AWS credentials.
captures.whyInteresting: Security concern directly relevant to our agent setup

captures.author: @KSimback
captures.text: If you're running OpenClaw and have had issues with your agent forgetting things, then this is your guide. Simple fixes to make it incredibly better.
captures.whyInteresting: Community memory fix guide for OpenClaw

captures.author: @johann_sath
captures.text: Using OpenClaw? Add this to your AGENTS.md today: fix errors immediately, spawn subagents for execution, never do inline work.
captures.whyInteresting: Practical AGENTS.md tips we could adopt

captures.author: @KingBootoshi
captures.text: Custom ES-lint rules are SO GOOD for agentic coding. Guardrails that prevent agent mistakes during code gen.
captures.whyInteresting: Clever use of ESLint as AI agent guardrails

captures.author: @JoshKale
captures.text: Google's Pomelli is awesome. Feed it your website to build brand DNA, prompt it to create any marketing material. Photoshoot feature replaces thousands in costs.
captures.whyInteresting: Google marketing tool with AI photoshoot — potential XPERIENCE use

captures.author: @nicopreme
captures.text: POV: Planning with the Visual Explainer skill. Can't go back to markdown plans after this.
captures.whyInteresting: Visual planning skill for OpenClaw — shows skills ecosystem maturity

captures.author: @johncodes
captures.text: Obsidian being an AI company was not on my 2026 bingo card.
captures.whyInteresting: Obsidian pivoting to AI — knowledge management industry signal

captures.author: @TheMattBerman
captures.text: Replaced a $200K GTM hire with OpenClaw. Full outbound system: LinkedIn mining, enrichment, ICP scoring, personalized outreach, pre-call research. $130/mo in APIs.
captures.whyInteresting: Full GTM automation pipeline using OpenClaw — business automation playbook

captures.author: @tom_doerr
captures.whyInteresting: AI text de-slopping tool — useful for content workflows

captures.author: @kloss_xyz
captures.text: Most give OpenClaw tasks. Almost nobody asks the real questions that make it smarter. Your agent understands your context, patterns, blind spots.
captures.whyInteresting: Using agent as thinking partner, not just task runner

captures.author: @ProperPrompter
captures.text: Seedance 2.0 image style transfer test — it's SOTA. Quick thread on how simple this is to do.
captures.whyInteresting: Directly relevant to Marb's Seedance/Red Rising interest

captures.author: @AlexanderTw33ts
captures.text: Team of expert AI agents in the cloud constantly red-teaming data and code.
captures.whyInteresting: Persistent AI security agents — applicable to our projects

captures.author: @mike_revenue
captures.text: Why do market research when Anthropic just told you exactly what to sell and who to sell it to. Listen to signal, not noise.
captures.whyInteresting: Reading Anthropic's moves to identify business opportunities
